term.title: isodesmic reaction

item.text: A reaction (actual or hypothetical) in which the types of bonds that are made in forming the products are the same as those which are broken in the reactants, e.g. [image: Not defined] [image: Not defined] Such processes have advantages for theoretical treatment. The Hammett equation as applied to equilibria [cf. (a)] essentially deals with isodesmic processes.
